name: Someone's there
description:
Our game has been made during and for the Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam.

In this horror-like game the player must search 15 special objects that get outlined in black when you are close.

Since the game happens in abandoned asylum in the dark, the player can use a lamp.

Credits :

The assets (asylum map, outline script, Player controller) are mostly from the Unity Asset Store.

Scripts, assets, gameplay and effects : FX_Bear (instagram.com/fx_bear_artstation-

Music and SFX : Daniel Wave
